remarks: The predicate "is a 3-dim lattice volume".  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lvolset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lvolset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lvolset.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lvolset.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
islvol $p |- ( K e. A -> ( X e. V <-> ( X e. B /\ E. y e. P y C X ) ) ) $.
$d K y $.
$d P y $.
$d X y $.
